'''1.8''' was a server version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released along with client version [[Classic 0.0.20a|0.0.20a]] on June 20, 2009,<ref>{{tumblr|Notch|127170416|New server, new client version 0.0.20|June 20, 2009}}</ref> at 20:53 UTC.<ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs] on Archive.org; #minecraft.20090620.log. "''P3:53:35 <Notch> new minecraft-server.zip up, new client up, there's a protocol change, so you need to update all servers''" (June 20, 2009, 20:53:35 UTC)</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added server support for the new blocks added in [[0.0.20a]].
* Added support for the {{cmd|/solid}} command, used to toggle between placing normal stone and unbreakable bedrock.

== Changes ==
* The server software no longer allows regular players to destroy bedrock, but admins can.
